section.name: How does this work
section.p: This application is a Turbine web application. The Turbine site contains some background on Turbine. However many people find it not sufficent to get started.
Antelope aims to provide a good sample of the commonly used features of Turbine and specicially how to use it with the Zebra workflow engine.

section.name: So what is Turbine
section.p: Turbine is a web application framework which makes it easy to build web applications within a Servlet environment.
